name: Mental Breakout
description: Sam and Julie are couples who wanted to uncover and destroy the bad government who made a mental prison that locks people out of their minds and controls their bodies as slaves, Sam and Julie were developing a technology called Mental Breakout where they communicate with prisoners to guide them out of their mental jail but unfortunately before they finish the project Sam got caught and jailed in the mental prison, where Julie continued to develop it to rescue her husband and return him to continue but she discovered that everyone gets their brain wiped when they enter the prison
